welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cabra, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and stunning sights that Cabra has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Imsik Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Imsik Airport, used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights within Turkey.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: Handles all international flights at Milas-Bodrum Airport.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: Serves all domestic flights within Turkey.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
